name: Omicrocity
description:
Omicrocity, city builder

Youtube Trailer

F1 cambia idioma.
F4 full-screen.

Like other games of the genre, you can build and manage the city, make the city you want and see how the citizens interact, is a interaction full of life and have strange events (like zombies) triggered by your build locations.

[ Como otros juegos del género, puedes construir y administrar la ciudad, haz la ciudad que quieres y mira cómo interactúan los ciudadanos, es una interacción llena de vida y tiene extraños eventos (como zombies) disparados por la ubicación de tus edificaciones. ]

here the features:

  • 38 buildings unlockables.
  • 23 social rols.
  • 4 social levels (stratus).
  • childs, adults and elders.
  • 1 natural animal.
  • 11 citizens aside from rols.
  • sickness.
  • hunger.
  • reproduction.
  • builds need energy.
  • rain.
  • roads constructed as graphs.
  • save image of your entire city.
  • 13 strange events like zombies.
  • clues to generate the events.
  • 6 flying machines.
  • handles the mayor.
  • auto display mode to watch the city comfortably.
  • save maps and send them to your friends as text files.

At start be patient, spend money wisely and understand the game.
